Interactively Mapping Crime in the UK

16 Jan 2021 · Economics, Python
I spent a good part of the first two weeks of 2021 building a dashboard that plots crime rates in the UK. It uses Dash, a framework for making web apps in Python (based on Flask), and is running on an Amazon Web Services EC2 instance. You can try it out here: http://13.212.193.155:8050/ (I haven’t gotten around to registering a domain name for this, and will probably do so if I ever decide to register a domain for the blog.)
